data.title: Robert Chandler Jr. (1659-abt.1720)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Compare DNA and explore genealogy for Robert Chandler Jr. born 1659 Chiskiak Parish, York, Virginia died 1720 St Peters, New Kent, Virginia including ancestors + descendants + 5 genealogist comments + Y-chromosome DNA + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Ancestors Descendants

Profile last modified 4 Aug 2024 | Created 13 Jul 2011

This page has been accessed 5,188 times.

Contents

1 Biography

1.1 Research Notes

2 Sources

3 Acknowledgements

Biography

Robert Chandler descends from John Chandler b.1600 England. First Chandler to come over. [1]

ROBERT CHANDLER was born April 30, 1659 in York Co., VA, and died 1720 in New Kent Co., VA. He married ELIZABETH PALMER 1683 in New Kent Co., VA, daughter of MARTIN PALMER and ELIZABETH MALLORY. She was born 1664 in King William Co., VA, and died 1745 in Virginia.[2] [3] [4] [5]

Robert inherited from his father half the money from the sale of a parcel of land. "the other halfe I give unto my second Sonne Robert Chandler to him and his heyres forever." He also received: " Item I give and bequeth unto my Sonne Robert Chandler one two year old (horse or heifer) by the name of Moll, cropt in both ears..and slitt in...Croppwith.."[6]

Marriage Notes for ROBERT CHANDLER and ELIZABETH PALMER: Robert and Elizabeth had 8 sons and 3 daughters (only 7 children are listed; the other names are unknown). All of their children were born in Virginia. Each son, in turn, used the same names for their children. The names were repeated over and over down through the generations, making identification difficult.

Children of ROBERT CHANDLER and ELIZABETH PALMER are:

i. JOEL CHANDLER, b. abt 1684 New Kent Co., VA; d. March 25, 1754, Cumberland Co., VA.

ii. TIMOTHY CHANDLER, b. October 17, 1685, New Kent Co., VA; d. June 1757, Caroline Co., VA.

iii. ROBERT CHANDLER, b. May 30, 1688, New Kent Co., VA; d. Aft. 1748, Virginia.

iv. WILLIAM CHANDLER, b. June 26, 1692, New Kent Co., VA; d. March 09, 1779, Halifax Co., VA.

v. JOHN CHANDLER, b. January 11, 1694/95, New Kent Co., VA; d. 1747, Goochland Co., VA.

vi. SUSANNE CHANDLER, b. 1702, New Kent Co., VA; m. JEAN PIERRE BILBO, 1720, Virginia; b. 1698, Virginia.

vii. JOSEPH CHANDLER, b. August 11, 1703, New Kent, VA; d. October 1764, Lunenburg Co., VA.

viii. MARY CHANDLER, b. August 11, 1703.

Research Notes

Robert is part of DNA Chandler Family 7A

Family
